title: Why Cyber security
summary: Exploring my journey into tech and what fascinates me about cyber security.
content: When I finished high school i was lost, didn't know what to do but ive always had an incline toward tech espcially hacking and thats where my story begins

title: Top 5 Tools Every hacker should master
summary: A list of essential tools I use daily as a tech student—from Git to VS Code.
content: As a third-year student, I’ve learnt that fear not the man who has learned a thousands kicks but the man whose learnt one kick a thousands times. consistency is key and its what will open doors for you, especially tech in 2025

title: Building My First Portfolio Website
summary: Lessons I learned from designing and coding my own portfolio site with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
content: This was both a fun and challenging project! lemme tell you those indians on youtube should be given their praises . I share how I planned the site, some mistakes I made, and what I'd do differently next time.

title: How to not stray during Finals
summary: Balancing project deadlines and exam prep is tough—here’s my personal focus system that works.
content: In kenya the saying is constant trust nobody suspect everybody, if you think that you and your friends are on the same boat cause you party everynight my friend! kitakuramaba.
